verbose_text: Previous work has suggested that LKB1 and its phosphorylation of Ser 431 controlled axon specification in the developing nervous system in response to BDNF by promoting the activation of the AMPK related kinases BRSK1 / BRSK2 (SAD-B / SAD-A) [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: BDNF by promoting the activation of the AMPK
